column3: You are come to Camp Dragonhead. Is there something you require?
A warm and hearty welcome to you, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. If there is aught you require─within reason, that is─it would be my honor to assist you.
I am a knight sworn to the service of House Fortemps, one of Ishgard's foremost families.
Our nation is locked in an age-old struggle against dragonkind. At any given time, the bulk of our military might is engaged with our ancient enemy.
For this reason, we must needs turn to outsiders for lesser feats of arms, such as the culling of unruly fauna. We hope we can rely upon you, too, adventurer.
Camp Dragonhead is an Ishgardian fortress held by House Fortemps, with the blessing of His Holiness, the archbishop.
Its name is taken from a nearby rock formation, which you may have glimpsed as you approached.
But mark my words: ere long, we shall adorn the fortress with a dragon's head in truth, and it will not be mere stone that greets you.
What kind of place is this?
